name: 小周美女
greetingText: 生日快乐啊 又长大一岁
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: 和相处你的这几天，每一天都很快乐啊
text3: 每天下班回家 最开心的事情就是和你打电话了
text4: I realised, I'd like to do something
outroText: 哈哈哈看完什么感觉，感动有没有🥳🥳
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again哈哈哈.
